page.title: 18HOME LIFE-A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: This is an example of my home life. I am quite a light sleeper. I wake at 7.0.p.m. I have brown bread and honey,then I put my clothes on, which is a skirt and top. Then I walk to school, I work as hard as I can in school and try to get high scores. I play three musical instruments-the recorder, guitar and violin cello. Each night when I get home I have to do l5 minutes 'cello practice. I mostly have salad for tea or something that does not take too long. I go to bed at nine o'clock. Sometimes I go a little later. I have one sister called Emma, she is twelve years old. I have a pet guinea-pig called Tiffy, my sister did have one called Honey but it died. We have quite a lot of blossom trees in our back garden. Sarah Barnes.
